Headline: #44 Wallace/Racine Temporary Southbound  Reroute near Archer/Canal
ShortDescription: Southbound  #44 Wallace/Racine buses are temporarily rerouted via Orange Line, Halsted, 26th and Wallace, due to street blockage near Archer/Canal.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound  #44 Wallace/Racine buses are temporarily rerouted via Orange Line, Halsted, 26th and Wallace, then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near Archer/Canal.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #50 Damen Temporary Reroute at Damen/Washington
ShortDescription: 50 Damen buses are rerouted in both directions via Damen, Madison, Ashland, Grand and Damen over regular route, due to street blockage near Damen/Washington.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Damen, Madison, Ashland, Grand and Damen over regular route, due to street blockage near Damen/Washington.

Allow extra travel time.
